TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SymScope extends System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymScopeBase implements class System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolScope, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Represents a lexical scope within , providing access to the start and end offsets of the scope, as well as its child and parent scopes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The SymScope class also provides access to all locals defined within the current scope.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.Private.ISymUnmanagedScope* pScope) cil managed
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

Docs.summary: Releases the resources used by the current instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool A_0) cil managed

Docs.param: to release managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.
Docs.summary: Called by the <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymScope.Dispose%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymScope.Finalize%2A> methods to release the managed and unmanaged resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is called only by the public <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymScope.Dispose%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymScope.Finalize%2A> methods; do not call this method directly.

Docs.summary: Gets the end offset of the current lexical scope.
Docs.value: The ending Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) offset. The offset is from the beginning of the method of the current lexical scope.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

Docs.summary: Releases unmanaged resources and performs other cleanup operations before the is reclaimed by garbage collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>. Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolScope[] GetChildren() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the child lexical scopes of the current lexical scope.
Docs.returns: The lexical scopes enclosed by the current lexical scope.
Docs.exception: There is insufficient memory to satisfy the request.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolVariable[] GetLocals() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the local variables within the current lexical scope.
Docs.returns: The local variables within the current lexical scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The local variables are returned in no particular order. If a local variable changes its address within the current scope, that variable is returned multiple times, each with a different offset range.

Docs.exception: There is insufficient memory to satisfy the request.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolNamespace[] GetNamespaces() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the method that contains the current lexical scope.
Docs.value: The method that contains the current lexical scope.

Docs.summary: Gets the parent lexical scope of the current scope.
Docs.value: The enclosing lexical scope of the current scope.

Docs.summary: Gets the start offset of the current lexical scope.
Docs.value: The starting Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) offset. The offset is from the beginning of the method of the current lexical scope.
